channel.title: thoughts on 颢阳's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in thoughts on 颢阳's Blog

item.title: Why DoorDash Cannot Deliver Your Order Properly
item.description: So I have requested a food delivery from DoorDash, and it happened that my food still hadn’t been picked up yet.

item.title: What Does It Mean When You Turn 25
item.description: I always wonder why people care so much about their ages – it’s unchangeable and unstoppable, which seems really meaningless to talk about it.
